mashup.description: This service is to Reset the Batch which have eligible shipments for reset.
This service is to print the batch list which are part of the Batch created.
This mashup is called on click of Print Batch button and when the batch is not created.This creates a new batch and prints.
This mashup is to get all the information related to item such as style,color,size,onhand inventory and planogram details
This mashup is to send the messages to SIM when shortage is recorded from Batch Screens
This service is to print the shipping label when clicked from related tasks
This service is to print the return label when clicked from related tasks
This service is to print the ORM-D label when clicked from related tasks
This mashup is to cancel the shipment if the shipment is from a store different than that of logged in store

Mashup for getting the SFS orders count for Backroom Pick statuses
This mashup is to get the user related details

Get Order Details matching search criteria
Get Order Line specific shipment information
Academy Cancel Order Service to cancel from search criteria
This service is to print the customer pickup acknowledgement
This api call is made to save the package weight and call Finish Pack service in a single transaction boundary.
Pick all shipment quantities
